title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: A young English officer, connected with some families of rank and influence, who was stationed with a recruiting-party at Perth, had become enamoured of a lady there, so young as still to be under the tuition of a dancingmaster.
